channel.description: Application updates for New Relic Monitor

item.title: Version 1.7.0
item.description:
What's New in v1.7.0

  • Improved Button Responsiveness - All header buttons now reliably respond to clicks
  • Layout Persistence - Your preferred view mode and column visibility are remembered across launches
  • 15 New UI Tests - Comprehensive automated tests for header buttons and navigation
  • Standard Window Style - Better macOS integration with proper title bar handling
  • Automatic Updates - App now checks for updates automatically via Sparkle
